channel.title: Oblivion Pk Compatable for any client
channel.description:
[QUOTE=Santa;1667693]Well after my friend Google Me wanted me to fix this i took me literally 30 seconds top to figure out what was causing other clients not to connect.
So i've decided to release this since Brent likes to infect people with botnets in his client. Etc..
Well heres the download link
100% Open source no anti-leaches.
And also just remove bluurs head icons for any client to work. It is set to bluurs client. But any client will connect tho but.
http://uppit.com/v/1MUJK0UG
^ Download Link enjoy
99% Credits to sanity 1% Credits to me for fixing this easy shit.
Notice: Magic dosen't work i don't think lol[/QUOTE]
Also i am Santa from r-s
PS.
Some information [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/hsvyw1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i32.tinypic.com/2801cfl.jpg[img] [img]http://i27.tinypic.com/30decyg.jpg[/img] [img]http://i30.tinypic.com/nbdj54.jpg[/img] [img]http://i29.tinypic.com/2873r68.jpg[/img] [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/2q9fo1f.jpg[/img]
[b][i][size=10pt]Re-Uploaded due to people pming me
http://uppit.com/v/1MUJK0UG[/size][/i][/b]

item.title: Oblivion Pk Compatable for any client
item.dc:creator: @regesterd regesterd
item.description:
@regesterd wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:7, topic:315464”][quote author=G Star link=topic=411907.msg3037792#msg3037792 date=1258879031]

Alot of stuff these days is being downloaded name changed home and training changed and a few custom items added. But what have you done no one else has?

Are you fucking retarded? Hes made it so other clients can connect to it… Gawwwd no wonder R-S is whayy past mopar.
[/quote]
By R-S I assume you mean RuneScape? Jagex will always be ahead of us unless some miracle happens like some brainless members who Sometimes Spell Like This and bitches who think they are cool by fucken swearing all the fucken time just leave.

Calm down dude. I was just asking

Alot of stuff these days is being downloaded name changed home and training changed and a few custom items added. But what have you done no one else has?

???
Dont these mean anything to you in life?[/quote]

hey fucking moron by “r-s” he means rune-server, fucking asshole.

Read full topic
